desc.en: The Guangzhou Metro is the rapid transit system of the city of Guangzhou in Guangdong Province of China. It is operated by the state-owned Guangzhou Metro Corporation and was the fourth metro system to be built in mainland China, after those of Beijing, Tianjin, and Shanghai.
desc.zh-Hans: 广州地铁xian'wang线网示意图(2024年3月版)

updateHistory.reason: Fix bugs in the original author version and update the new Guangzhou Metro System Map
